summary: This testimony updates the House on DOD space system acquisitions, such as satellites and ground equipment. Our work has found many major DOD space programs exceed their budgets and are late. For instance, the cost of a satellite communications system has grown 117% and its first launch was delayed more than 3.5 years. Today, as DOD is simultaneously undertaking major acquisitions to replenish missile warning...
title: Space Acquisitions: DOD Faces Significant Challenges as it Seeks to Address Threats and Accelerate Space Programs
